content.raw: Although seemingly unrelated to the tab-dragging issue Shaun is talking about in pull request #8, I found a NameError in the tab icon updating code, which was being hidden by an exception catching block. I've fixed the NameError and refactored the `update_tab_icon_and_colour()` function to not use broad exception-catching for its control flow.
content.html: Although seemingly unrelated to the tab-dragging issue Shaun is talking about in pull request #8, I found a NameError in the tab icon updating code, which was being hidden by an exception catching block. I've fixed the NameError and refactored the update_tab_icon_and_colour() function to not use broad exception-catching for its control flow.
